print('mean',mean)
standard_deviation = math.sqrt(sum((x-mean)**2)/len(x))

source.3862784d:
# STANDARDIZATION
`y = (x - mean) / standard_deviation`

`mean = sum(x) / count(x)`

`standard_deviation = sqrt( sum( (x - mean)^2 ) / count(x))`
